title: kUsu kaNDIryA
sahitya:
lakkeyO vaikuNTha lakkeyO


anupallavi

  oggili shrIhariyanADo sujanarge


caraNam 1    samsAravembOdu staravallavendu samshayavembOdu inidillave 
hamsana tanna maneyoLu nEmisi kamsariyeDeyoLu kaDu snEha mALvage
    caraNam 2    mAyA pAshava kaLedu madamatsaravaLidu kAyavu sthiravallavendu tiLidu 
nyAya mIrade anyAyakke sErade kAyaja pitanoLu kaDu snEha mALvage
    caraNam 3    bhrU madhyadeDeyoLu nAsikAgradoLu nEmadinda drSTiya nillisi 
prEmadi purandara viTTalana bhajisuta bhUmiyoLiha buddhivanta manujarige
